price: Sa'an nan a lõkacin* da suka shiga gun Yũsufu, yã tattara mahaifansa biyu a gare shi, kuma ya ce: "Ku shiga Masar in Allah Ya so, kuna amintattu."
arabic: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُواْ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ أَبَوَيۡهِ وَقَالَ ٱدۡخُلُواْ مِصۡرَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ
footnotes: * Yũsufu ya sãdu da ubansa da uwarsa. A Larabci anã rinjãyar da uba a kan uwa, a ce ubanni biyu, kuma ga Hausa anã rinjayar da wa a kan uba, a ce uwãye biyu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā dakhalū ʿalā yūsufa āwā ilayhi abawayhi waqāla ud'khulū miṣ'ra in shāa al-lahu āminīna
